Name: Fantastic Ta-das and Where to Find Them
Description: By the cliff's edge, a peculiar girl draws your attention. She seems to be attempting some sort of challenge.
QuestDesc: By the cliff's edge, a peculiar girl draws your attention. She seems to be attempting some sort of challenge.

Dialogues.Speaker: Laramia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Pull yourself together. Don't be scared. Even if you fall, Lorel will pull you back up...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The girl takes a deep breath...

Dialogues.Speaker: Laramia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, hello! I'm in the middle of a secret training!

Dialogues.Speaker: Laramia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You seen those giant swords stuck into the cliff?

Dialogues.Speaker: Laramia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They say if you jump along those swords all the way to the end, you can finish Lorel's trial!

Dialogues.Speaker: Laramia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, that's the name I gave to this little Ta-da. Every time I fall, it carries me back to where I fell. It's amazing, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Laramia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, it's not that dangerous. Lorel's always here to catch you. Even if you fail, you'll still be safe!

Dialogues.Speaker: Laramia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Say, you look pretty agile. Want to give it a try?

Dialogues.Speaker: Laramia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you make it, Lorel will reward you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Laramia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, {PlayerName}, did you finish the challenge?

Dialogues.Speaker: Laramia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow, that's impressive! So, how do you feel?

Dialogues.Speaker: Laramia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? Easy? Well, I won't say that. Guess it depends on the person, haha...

Dialogues.Speaker: Laramia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Seems like there aren't for now. It said that with your skill, you're already one of the greatest warriors it's ever seen. That's amazing...

Dialogues.Speaker: Laramia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I wish I could be as strong as you someday.
